column1: Adam’s idea: pundits are worried about public gatherings including the next #SuperTuesday . @SenSanders and @JoeBiden tonight can do the unthinkable by Bernie stepping out and Biden welcoming Bernie and his policies in. No more need for primaries. #DemDebate #coronavirus
